alert.note: Alert for Brantley (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 20 at 9:35AM EDT until September 22 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Satilla River At Atkinson affecting Brantley County. Additional information is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/forecasts.php?wfo=jax. The next statement will be issued Thursday morning at 945 AM EDT. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Satilla River at Atkinson. * WHEN...Until early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Warners Landing, Louis Landing and secondary roads around KOA campgrounds begin to flood. At 14.0 feet, River Rock Road begins to experience flooding across the road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM EDT Wednesday the stage was 13.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow evening and continue falling to 12.5 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
